channel.title: neural networks on Magnus Borresen
channel.description: Recent content in neural networks on Magnus Borresen

item.title: Robustness Testing of a CNN in Acoustic Scene Classification
item.description: The first semester of the master studies in Signal Processing was more or less an introduction to signal processing within audio systems. We had a few project proposals from external companies. My project group and I (4 people in total), found a few of the proposals from the company RTX A/S interesting. RTX works a lot in the audio domain and develops a great deal of headset technology. They were interested in some student investigating more into classification of acoustic scenes using neural networks.
